hero.title: Computer Engineering Graduate
hero.description: I'm focused on web and mobile development, ready to grow my skills and make meaningful contributions to projects.

about.title: About Me
about.background_description: I got into programming through my Bachelor in Computer Engineering but web and mobile development is what really stuck with me.
background_points: Co-developed a water management system for Portuguese reservoirs, designed for farmers and water researchers, now proposed for a European initiative.
Exploring React Native for mobile app development as a side project to expand my skillset.
Fluent in English (native) and Portuguese, enabling me to work in diverse environments.

looking_for_points.title: Entry-Level Positions
looking_for_points.description: Web or mobile development roles to kickstart my career

looking_for_points.title: Development Projects
looking_for_points.description: Opportunities to contribute and grow my skills

looking_for_points.title: Ready to Add Value
looking_for_points.description: Eager to work, learn, and contribute meaningfully

items.title: Water Wise
items.description: Co-developed a geospatial platform for managing Portuguese reservoirs, designed to support farmers and water researchers with real-time data and soon decision-making tools.

items.title: Yoke - Fitness App
items.description: Co-developing a mobile fitness app as a side project with a friend to track workouts, nutrition, and progress, featuring exercise libraries and customizable meal planning.

items.title: SNS Hospitals App
items.description: Co-developed a mobile app to help users find and evaluate hospitals in Portugal, featuring real-time hospital data, interactive maps, and offline support.

items.title: Live Notes App
items.description: Real-time collaborative notes app with a zoomable canvas to create, move, and edit notes; includes live presence and authenticated sessions. Built with Next.js and Firebase.
